alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham; Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:10PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stokes, Yadkin, eastern Surry, Rockingham, Caswell, southeastern Floyd, Henry, Pittsylvania, western Halifax, Patrick and southern Franklin Counties, the City of Danville and the City of Martinsville through 815 PM EST... At 708 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking widespread showers and isolated thunderstorms. The strongest thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Endicott, to near Pinnacle, to Courtney. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Eden... Reidsville... Martinsville... Rocky Mount... Yadkinville... and Wentworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
